About Me

An embedded freak, wonderer, internet nomad that's passionate about
electronics and software that powers them. Loves tinkering with them
as well :-)

To be honest, I derive pleasure and joy breaking apart electronics to
examine and study them and hopefully demystify them for fun :-))

I often branch out to writing code as a seasoned software developer
when not tinkering with them electronics.

I have found these programming languages to be fascinating and worth
spending time on.

  • Fourth
  • web assembly
  • Rust

Happy tinkering yeyyh!!!
